differences.gitbook: Regular meeting of Education Guild. This meeting covered: Updates from CCCP- Ai for Beginners Discussions-Wiki Website Updates- Webinar Series Updates- Updates from Kenichi regarding presentation series
differences.supabase: Updates from CCCP- Ai for Beginners Discussions-Wiki Website Updates- Webinar Series Updates- Updates from Kenichi regarding presentation series

differences.gitbook: Slate started the meeting greeting everyone.
differences.supabase: Slate started the meeting greeting everyone

differences.gitbook: Slate gave some updates from the certification program: multiple core contributors are taking part in the certification program and many have already started. He also mentioned that Onize was able to complete most of the classroom and she has progressed to the classroom#15 but unfortunately she wasnt able to progress any further than that.
differences.supabase: Then after the introduction part , Slate gave some updates from the certification program that multiple core contributors are taking part in the certification program and many have already started

differences.gitbook: Ese gave updates on the outreach of the certification program: socials have already posted about it, and regular updates will also be given through ambassador general Discord channel.
differences.supabase: He also mentioned that onize was able to complete most of the classroom and she has progressed to the classroom#15 but unfortunately she wasnt able to progress any further than that

differences.gitbook: Several video creators were selected for Ai for Beginners and assigned the modules. There was also a need for a scriptwriter, but since there were too many people in the meeting it will be selected asynchrounously.
differences.supabase: AFter wards ese gave updates regarding the outreach of the certification program that socials have already posted about the certification program and regular updates will also be given through ambassador general channel

differences.supabase: Then from Ai for beginners multiple video creators were selected and assigned the modules , there was also a need for the script writer but since there were too many people in the meeting it will be selected asynchrounously
